import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import {connect} from 'unistore/react' import {actions} from '../store'; class Detail extends Component { handleClick = (e) => { this.props.getStoreProfile(e.target.value) this.props.history.push("/userprofile") }; render(){ return (

{this.props.item_detail.item_name}

Rp.{this.props.item_detail.price}

{this.props.item_detail.description}

Size : {this.props.item_detail.size}

Color : {this.props.item_detail.color}

Store : {this.props.item_detail.posted_by}



); } } export default connect( "item_detail, id", actions )(withRouter(Detail));
